description: The Morning Cloud Chitalpa—with its stunning multicolored foliage of sunny yellow and deep, vibrant rose—is an amazing sight! Its unique beauty combines the best of the Chitalpa tree and the Desert Willow. This drought-tolerant tree can withstand both cold weather and full sun, blooming with a profusion of white, lilac-tinged bells that attract butterflies and sweetly scent the air. Its cascading branches are as eye-catching as its blooms, with its interesting textured, furrowed bark and grey-green foliage. An easily maintained member of the Bignoniaceae family, the Morning Cloud Chitalpa is sure to become a staple of any garden with its low maintenance and eye-catching beauty.
